entries.headline: The hive has a voice
entries.blurb: Added ElevenLabs support! Now your AI creations can speak with crystal-clear high-fidelity audio.

entries.headline: Fresh blooms: Imagen 4 & Grok Video
entries.blurb: Planted a colorful array of new models including Google's Imagen 4, Flux 2 Dev, and an alpha preview of Grok Video.

entries.headline: More time to think
entries.blurb: Moved the AI gateway to a custom domain to prevent timeouts. Now the deep-reasoning models have plenty of space to ponder.

entries.headline: Polishing the GSoC trellis
entries.blurb: Fixed scroll behavior on the Google Summer of Code page so navigation feels smooth for our incoming student sprouts.
